claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Jules Henri Poincaré  (  -LSB- ʒyl ɑ̃ʁi pwɛ̃kaʁe -RSB- ; 29 April 1854 -- 17 July 1912  )  was a French mathematician , theoretical physicist , engineer , and philosopher of science .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is often described as a polymath , and in mathematics as The Last Universalist by Eric Temple Bell , since he excelled in all fields of the discipline as it existed during his lifetime .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As a mathematician and physicist , he made many original fundamental contributions to pure and applied mathematics , mathematical physics , and celestial mechanics .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was responsible for formulating the Poincaré conjecture , which was one of the most famous unsolved problems in mathematics until it was solved in 2002 -- 2003 by Grigori Perelman .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In his research on the three-body problem , Poincaré became the first person to discover a chaotic deterministic system which laid the foundations of modern chaos theory .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is also considered to be one of the founders of the field of topology .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Poincaré made clear the importance of paying attention to the invariance of laws of physics under different transformations , and was the first to present the Lorentz transformations in their modern symmetrical form .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Poincaré discovered the remaining relativistic velocity transformations and recorded them in a letter to Dutch physicist Hendrik Lorentz  (  1853 -- 1928  )  in 1905 .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Thus he obtained perfect invariance of all of Maxwell 's equations , an important step in the formulation of the theory of special relativity .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1905 , Poincaré first proposed gravitational waves  (  ondes gravifiques  )  emanating from a body and propagating at the speed of light as being required by the Lorentz transformations .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Poincaré group used in physics and mathematics was named after him .

claim: Henri Poincare was a French mathematician.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In mathematics , ` Name is Smoke and Mirrors '  (  ` Name ist Schall und Rauch ' , literally : ` name is sound and smoke ' in German  )  from Goethe 's tragic play Faust was Henri Poincare 's response to Felix Klein 's vexation of Poincare 's creation of the term ` the Kleinian function for all other cases of S ' .
